channel.description: Recent content in anomaly-detection on (Machine) Learning log.

item.title: Time-series Anomaly detection with autoencoder
item.description: One powerful use case, yet often overlooked, of the autoencoders is anomaly detection. In this tutorial, I will show how to use autoencoders to detect abnormal electrocardiograms (ECG). I will divide the tutorial in two parts. The first one, here will guide you throught the problem formulation and how to train the autoencoder neural network over the ECG data. I will release the next part in a week or two, so please subscribe to have the update!
